Posts.EditableText:
I have a font I want to use but Quest isn't listing it and I have no idea how to get it to add it to the list.

I see the problem of adding a new font as if someone who doesn't have that font it would load right for them.
Posts.HTML:
I have a font I want to use but Quest isn't listing it and I have no idea how to get it to add it to the list.

I see the problem of adding a new font as if someone who doesn't have that font it would load right for them.

Posts.EditableText: Be aware that - like images - fonts may have a license attached to them. Better stick to the standard (web) fonts if possible.
Posts.HTML: Be aware that - like images - fonts may have a license attached to them. Better stick to the standard (web) fonts if possible.
